channel.title: How to make a downloadable client?
channel.description: ok i have my server online and registered but you cant play without my client what files do i have to put in the folder to make it work?

item.title: How to make a downloadable client?
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

make client.jar and send it to your friends.

[youtube]http://youtu.be/fpeeK4EFb4I[/youtube]

item.title: How to make a downloadable client?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Actually, the way your saying is allowing players to modify it.

You do this:

  1. Make a new folder named your server name Release
  2. Copy and paste ALL your Client’s files in your server name Release.
  3. Now, in your server name Release, delete all .java files.
  4. Finally, zip it or rar it and put it up to download.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a downloadable client?

item.title: How to make a downloadable client?
item.dc:creator: @fafaerer fafaerer
item.description:
@fafaerer wrote:

If I understand correctly, you have a client that you can play on, and you want to let people play on your server with that client.
If that’t the case, copy your client folder, and rename the clone you just made.
Assuming that you know where the IP to connect to a server is, change that to your IP, domain, or a no-ip redirect.
Then you will have to compile your client. Following that, delete all the .java files in that folder so no one has the source
to your client. After that all you have to do is upload the client to a filesharing website such as mediafire, uppit, or rapidshare.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a downloadable client?
